subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: West Indies sailed into the World Twenty20 semifinals after Dwayne Bravo’s power hitting and Samuel Badree’s spin bowling fashioned an 84-run victory over Pakistan in Mirpur, Bangladesh.
snippet: West Indies sailed into the World Twenty20 semifinals after Dwayne Bravo’s power hitting and Samuel Badree’s spin bowling fashioned an 84-run victory over Pakistan in Mirpur, Bangladesh.
